short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension for screen sharing on link4.chat !

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The global world leads to new requirements for worldwide located teams. To keep in touch with your team (up to 10 people) you can use www.link4.chat without any costs, any registration or an application. 

To share your presentation or work with your team you only have to install our Screen-Share plug-in. 

With the plug-in you and your co-workers can benefit from the 
•	screen-share mode and
•	full-screen mode

With or without the plug-in you can always use all features from www.link4.chat:
•	File sharing up to 1 GB
•	Text-Chat
•	Easy URL sharing by QR Code
•	Cryptic URL’s 
•	Encrypted Group Chat transmission
